services
Class DataMiningService

java.lang.Object
  services.DataMiningService

public class DataMiningService
extends java.lang.Object

This service provides the API for (Data Mining) as described in the MobiSoc paper/documentation. Due to restrictions imposed by KSOAP on the type of dataobects that can be exchanged, for ceratin methods we provide two versions of the API. One that works with KSOAP and the other one works generally. If we do not provide a specific KSOAP version, then the method works with KSOAP as well as in the general case. The parameters that guide the data mining algorithms can be changed in the class definition. The parameters are preset to optimal values. Details on how to set these paprameters can be obtained from the Mobisoc and GPI journal papers.

Author:
Maverick

Constructor Detail

public DataMiningService()
Method Detail

extractGroupsAndPlaces

public void extractGroupsAndPlaces(java.lang.Long userId,
                                   java.lang.Long placeId,
                                   java.lang.Long startTime,
                                   java.lang.Long endTime)
This function is used to extract groups and group places for a given user and a given place between a given time frame. The group/place extraction process in described in the GPI journal paper. Make sure that you have extracted significant places for all the users, using the method "extractPlaces" for at least the same time frame as used for this API. Also make sure that you have extracted co-present users for all the users, using the the method "extract copresent users" for at least the same time frame as used for this API

Parameters:
userId - User Id for the user whose groups/places are to be discovered
placeId - Place Id for the user whose groups/places are to be discovered
startTime - Start time for search in milliseconds (converted from timestamp object)
endTime - End time for search in milliseconds (converted from timestamp object)

extractCopresentUsers

public void extractCopresentUsers(java.lang.Long userId,
                                  java.lang.Long startTime,
                                  java.lang.Long endTime)
This function finds out all the users that were copresent with a given user between a given time frame. The copresent users are then stored in the database along with the time when they were co-present. Before you use this API, make sure that you have extracted significant places for all the users using the method "extractPlaces" for at least the same time frame as used for this API.

Parameters:
userId - User Id for the user for whom we find co-present users
startTime - Start time for search in milliseconds (converted from timestamp object)
endTime - End time for search in milliseconds (converted from timestamp object)

extractPlaces

public void extractPlaces(java.lang.Long userId,
                          java.lang.Long startTime,
                          java.lang.Long endTime,
                          java.lang.String mode)
This API is used to extract significant places for a user in a given time frame.

Parameters:
userId - User Id for the user for whom we find co-present users
startTime - Start time for search in milliseconds (converted from timestamp object)
endTime - End time for search in milliseconds (converted from timestamp object)
mode - This is the mode used for storing raw location data. this can be "Centroid" or "Fingerprinting"
